| PRESS & PRAISE |
We are still in awe of the magic you created for us. It’s hard to believe that such a perfect, love-filled day was real – and we owe it all to you. From start to finish, you poured your hearts..."
- Chi & Quốc -
We have watched the wedding videos a hundred times! We simply feel so lucky to have you as our wedding planner. Our friends also praised your team a lot. It was incredible to have a wedding theme that fitted InterContinental..."
- Eric & Helen -
We send our biggest thank to The Planners team for yesterday’s wedding. We are extremely happy and proud to have been on this journey with such responsible wedding planners who take care of us every step of the way. We..."
- Quỳnh Sơn -
We thank The Planners Saigon team so much for having always supported us at everything, even the tiniest stuff. Almost a year of coming up with ideas and creating the concept to deliver a wedding exceeding all of our expectations,..."
- Maria & Duy -
Long and I thank The Planners Saigon so much for delivering a perfect and memorable wedding for us. We didn’t feel tired at all and laughed nonstop… I didn’t expect to have such an emotional and fun wedding like this,..."
- Long & Anna -
Quynh Anh and her team at The Planners provided me with tremendous support and consulting throughout the planning process and wedding day. Quynh Anh was truly the best companion I could ask for! It almost felt like some sort of..."
- Linh & Hai -

serpData.description: We are proud to deliver our services to hundreds of clients for over a decade. Let's take a look at the beautiful decoration and unforgettable moments that we have created for them.
